Smart Hanger: A coat hanger with built-in smart technology that can detect when a garment is placed on it and automatically adjust the lighting and temperature in the surrounding area to create the perfect environment for the garment to maintain its shape and prevent wrinkles.
Fold-Away Hanger: A coat hanger that can fold up and store itself when not in use, saving space and creating a more organized and clutter-free closet.

Smart Mirror Coat Hanger: A coat hanger with a built-in mirror that can provide a full-body view when hanging clothes, making it easier to check the fit and appearance of garments without having to take them down.
Hanger with Built-in Steamer: A coat hanger with a built-in steamer that can quickly and easily remove wrinkles from garments without the need for a separate steamer.
